content.detailedDescription: On the morning of monday, december, 29th, 2014, my mother and i were driving back to pennsylvania from a trip to florida. as we drove through the state of maryland, at approximately 3:55 am, according to the dash board clock, i noticed a large bright light glide over interstate 95, almost directly over our car, just enough to get my attention. i was driving about 70 mph and pressed my face against the front windshield to get a better look at it, and to my amazement, i saw a triangle craft with two oval lights on the back corners of the craft and a large red light in the center. i could also make out a very dark point on the craft which i thought to be the front of it, or the tip of the triangle. it stopped and hovered over a group of trees as i drove down the highway. i quickly screamed to my sleeping mother in the passenger’s seat to look out her window, she woke up and immediately saw what i was yelling about. she was mesmerized. i was trying to look at the craft and the road at the same time and that was when i noticed that the edges of the craft were more rounded, almost like a popsicle stick. it had two layers, on the bottom was the color of the cloudy night sky, and the top was a very brilliant black color. i fumbled for my phone that had a camera attached to it and my mom watched as it hovered over a group of trees. it hovered only about five to ten feet over the tree tops. she got a better view of the craft and said that the red light in the center of the “v” was very “unusual” and very large and red. when i took out the camera to take the picture, i aimed the camera towards it, but it went from a stationary position above the tree line, to completely disappearing out of view and i couldn’t get the picture taken. she told me that when i took out the camera and aimed it, it was almost as if “the ufo knew i was about to take a picture and took off”. we both became very excited from what we just saw and then i took notice of the time and it read, 3:55 am.  the approaching exit that was then seen was for the ellicott city off ramp.
content.summary: Triangle ufo over interstate 95 in maryland
content.locationName: Next exit was Ellicott Ci, Maryland

content.detailedDescription: I was in my driveway with my 8 year old son looking at the full moon through his telescope. i stood up and moved to my right facing the south and a red glowing ball descended quickly (about 5 seconds) from about 45 degrees above me to down behind the horizon of my neighbors house. it looked as though it could have fallen into the ocean.  it was approximately 7pm and looked too big and too fast to be a firework or a lantern.  i was curious enough to check this site to file a report.
content.summary: Red glowing ball descended quickly in the southern sky

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting took place at two separate times during a four hour period and actually began at approximately 9:30pm est december 31, 2014.

it was new years eve 2014, my girlfriend and i were in my back yard enjoying a fire in the fire pit, my mother inside watching tv.  we were sitting around the fire just talking when i turned around facing my house and saw several orange orbs floating across the sky above and to the north of my position. we then noticed that more of these orbs were approaching from the west and moving apparently in single file formation in an easterly direction.  i then ran into the house and called my mother out to see as well.  we all looked on as each of the eight objects appeared to simply disappear one by one once reaching approximately the same location in the sky. we all discussed what they could have been and couldn't explain any of it.

part two:
later that same evening at about 1:30am est january 1, 2015 my girlfriend and i were getting ready to go in for the night when we saw several more orbs of the same description. each orb, ten in all, ( 18 total ) was following the same west to east path and disappeared in about the same location in the sky.  we got quite a few pictures this time with our cell phones. while we were taking pictures my girlfriends phone shut down three separate times...My phone was not affected in any way.

two of the photos show objects we did not see directly.
content.summary: Small orange orbs flying/floating across night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on greenspring avenue, i noted this low flying white color sun-reflecting object flying above the treeline faster than a helicopter. it looked like two inverted circular cake pans with a protruding lip. it traveled in my visibility for about 30 seconds and disappeared. there were other cars on the road at the time, but no one stopped to watch. interesting to note, i first spotted it over the area where an old nike missile base used to be. it appeared to be no bigger than the front seating area of a helicopter. what brought it to my attention was its reflective quality.

when i checked on the internet to see if anyone else saw it, i saw an article about a 2/14 siting in baltimore's inner harbor with a picture. the shape of that ufo matched what i saw.
content.summary: Reflective inverted cake pan structure

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside looking up at venus when it split in half left side remained still right side started moving up and down right and left.Then it started moving westward and made a curve and came in from the north leaving a white trail.It stopped about 30 ft. from me about 20 ft off the ground in the edge of some trees.Inside the sphere was a white human like being white smooth skin white hair and beard.He turned his head and looked at me and the sphere shot straight northward about 50 ft. and vanished into thin air.At the time i had no ideal what i had seen or what took place i was freaked i have never seen anything like this before.This event changed me physically and mentally over the years i have reached my conclusions and what this has done to me on my blog for more info.
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]  thanks [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Light orb with white human like being

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in a car when suddenly i just see this black bizarre object hovering over the sky of dhaka. the first thing i thought was: that has to be a ufo it doesn't look like any drone or cloud seeder at all. it looked like a line with three other lines coming off of the top and the same thing on the bottom, it looked like, on these six lines, that tea bags were hanging off. the bottom and top six were rotating and the object was going in a straight direction. then it went into the clouds. i felt confused at this event and didn't know what it was.
content.summary: Black, had a long structure, six other black structures attached with a tea bag shape attached to that

content.detailedDescription: I saw ufo near panvel when i was travelling via train mandovi express. firstly my sister saw thar object than i also saw that ufo around 4 times. it was verg brigt and in shape of tube light. it was travelling oposite dirction of the train suddenly i saw an flame type thing comes and it disappeared.. it occurs 4 times.
content.summary: I saw ufo near panvel.

content.detailedDescription:
I've just watched a programme involving a mufon story about a sighting by denise murter in bucks county. this involved 'glittering light'. it reminded me of a story told me in 2003 by a friend, ab. he said when he was a young man he looked out of his bedroom window and saw a (vertical) cylinder of glittering light moving slowly down his high street. he went downstairs and walked up to it. it was hollow, but full of thousands of glittering lights. as he got closer he became terrified. the lights were somehow infinite, never ending, inside. he ran indoors and upstairs again. he watched as it carried on down the street.  

my friend is a mechanical engineer. in some quarters he is a well regarded inventor. 

on another occasion he was sitting on a bench and saw a massive cylinder drop from the sky, landing in front of him. it was the size of a submarine, and seemed crudely constructed. he had a strong impression it was aware of him. it shot up and out into space almost instantaneously. 

he developed views on inertia as a result, in which such craft could be shot into space with only a 6v battery if inertial forces could be neutralised. he developed an idea on how this could be done. this strikes me as a plausible alternative to the airship theory considered in the programme by another witness of the glittering light (mrs murter's son?).
content.summary: A glowing cylinder moving down a deserted street at night

content.detailedDescription: It was about just after 10pm my father came to see me & he asked me to have a look at strang lights in the sky he knows i like star gazing i went outside nr where i live & i could see there was two realy bright lights in the sky one was brighter than the other,we both was amazed how strange it looked & didn't look that far away unless it was so big i ran & got my phone to take pictures, my father even asked a naighbour to look at it!I took pictures then after some time we came inside we looked at the pic & was even more shocked to see the pic close up they looked even more strange with a closer look!! we went back outside but it had got cloudy & coulden't see anything then. just to let you know i have more pictures but could only send a few. i have pictures at two different events & times in the same place one on 8/12/14 & 31/12/14
content.summary: I am always watching the stars & my father in all his 70 odd yrs has never seen anything like this.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard with my son ( 38 years old) doing some star gazing. i have a 12" skywatcher 300p telescope so we do get out as often as we can when the sky is clear enough. we had been looking at pleiades through the scope and was having a small break and a chat ( cig time ). we were both gazing at the sky when i saw what i thought was a shooting star. pointing, i said to my son there's a shooting star. he said "yes i see it". as it shot across the sky we watched. it was moving from east to west direction. it seemed to change direction very slightly toward the north as it went. then at about 45 degrees toward the horizon. it suddenly shot off to the south direction. we both saw this and said that ain't no shooting star. as this was christmas eve we both said it must have been santa (laughing). but we both agreed it was not a shooting star.
content.summary: Looked similar to shooting star.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a cold winters day when i was a young girl, delivering newspapers with my brother who had been sent to help me since night had set in.
we only had to deliver the last road on the other side of the main road into our little town but waited for what we thought was a car coming as we saw bright light shining our way coming from the neighbouring  village in the north.
there was no sound. we waited as the light got brighter. a diamond shaped, dark, roughly 5-7 meters large object appeared with 5 bright white- blueish lights shining our way - now just hovering about 2-5 meters above the ground on the brow of the hill about 20 meters away from us.
only a minute or so later this object shot high up into the sky, paused, seemed to turn on its side-now flashing coloured lights in a circular pulse then shot off into the distance to the west. i have never seen anything move like that-the lack of sound was so strange. i was so excited and perplexed - i looked at my brother who looked as startled as i must have and felt myself shaking from the experience.
we finished our paper round and ran home to tell our parents about what had just happened - i just wanted to see it again & find out what it was but that was the last i saw of it.
content.summary: Flying object sighted

content.detailedDescription:
-driving around corner on bluevale st n. as front seat passenger.
-patrick(driver) noticed craft hovering above trees in front of us.
-i then saw craft and immediately asked pat to stop the car.  
-i then asked him to shut of the motor.
-i got out of the vehicle(pat does not remember me getting out of the car)
-we both observed the y shaped craft hovering, then tilt and rotate and begin moving in a se direction.  
-the object made no sound and had 3 lights on each tip.
-seemed to be a access dome or panel directly in the middle on the bottom of the object.
-as i blinked the object got further and further away eventually out of sight.
-the object looked metallic and was far to low to be a conventional aircraft.
-myself of pat have never seen anything like before the occurrence nor anything like it since.
-i was in awe when i saw it and every time i think back on the event i get frustrated that i don't know what it was.
-the main part of the frustration comes from the fact that i wasn't alone at the time this event took place, neither of us has a clue as to its origin, and we also went to school on this street.  why was this craft over a civilian population.  if it is an advanced military craft, then wouldn't a more appropriate location be used?
-i think about it everyday and it has me very confused. 
regression therapy?
advice? 
any help would be appreciated.
content.summary: Y shaped craft hovered was spotted by patrick(driver).  i then saw it, we stopped car and observed craft.

content.detailedDescription:
Only you could see through the camera 
on a night of the red horizont
content.summary: Ufo in spain huesca

content.detailedDescription:
My love and i were taking our almost-nightly walk.  it was around 10:30 p.M.  we were talking, engrossed in a word rhyming game which we always play on our walks.  he was taking longer than usual trying to find a word and was looking down.  i was ho-humming, looking around at the houses which we were walking by when my upper-right peripheral vision caught site of two very bright amber-colored lights.  i couldn't believe it!  he looked up right away.  we saw two orb-like lights (i think in the southwestern sky), one light over the other, with generous space between them.  i pointed to them, and he quickly pushed my arm down, telling me that my action might not be a good idea in case we might be seen by them/it.  we started walking a little faster, as if somehow we might catch up with it.  unfortunately, i need eye-glasses for distance; i don't bring them on our walks, as i can't see him as clearly as i can without them.  so the amber orbs, to me, looked as if rays were completely encircling a more solid center portion.  he has great distance vision and, to him, the two lights appeared round and solid.  inside of a minute's time, we saw the lower light descend a bit, though noticeably, from the top light.  the lower light then moved to the left.  and here is where we differ a bit in our observation:  i saw this lower light continue to move laterally to the left, at a kind of "walking pace",  and completely fade away, all the while not getting any smaller; he saw this lower light shoot off to the left at amazingly high speed.  then, the remaining light gradually faded into nothingness.

we were both awestruck!  we've been talking about it throughout all day yesterday.  last night, i made sure i brought along my glasses in my pocket - just in case our amber lights might do an encore performance - but, no luck.  at least, not yet............
content.summary: Two bright star-like lights, one under the other; lower one descended, quickly shooting and fading away.  remaining one gradually disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: walked outside with girlfriend as she was going to work. spotted a single light in the north sky and remarked on it - she said it was airplane. i said that glows different and there are no green and red lights marking lights - just a orange glow, unlike airplanes. we watched as 2 more joined it, and i said "getting camera", ran inside, came out and she said there is a 4th light, i started filming as we talked, but only seemed to capture street lights. the other 3 lights seemed to start to go up into the low clouds after 5 minutes or so, as the first light started flickering as it appeared to disappear into the low clouds as well about a minute after the other 3 lights vanished. no sound heard by either of us.  (would submit video but was only able to film house lights, not the lights themselves.)
content.summary: Spotted 4 glowing orange lights in night sky above fort bragg, california

content.detailedDescription:
We (my wife & i) were sitting on our deck with one of our parrots (they can spot jets in the sky even at pinpoints) and sid (the parrot on my shoulder) started "chirppering - they do that when they detect 'danger' like hawks or to them anything in the sky) - so i looked up expecting to see a jet (cause we live near philly airport) but instead saw a very large disc moving silently over our house....And there were jets in the sky at the time. how they didn't see it is beyond me. it was huge from our perspective - seemed much higher than than the normal jet traffic we see. my guessimate....Easily a mile wide. also, we live within sight of the limerick nuclear plant (not saying that makes a difference). i know flying aircraft...This was not one.

i need to add the (to me) weird part - at the time the moon was up but the 'light' parts of the moon blended in with the sky....And the craft we saw was the same way - we could see the outline and a center circle but mostly blended with the color of the sky. anyone see that too ?
content.summary: Looked up & saw a disc shaped craft that was not any aircraft i've seen before

content.detailedDescription: one night at approximately at 3:35 am i was awoke by 3 and a half foot beings touching me. they started by tapping hard on my feet and up my body until one tapped my face, then i sat up in my bed and saw what it was a 3'6" humanoid being wearing a flat black hooded robe with a seem less helmet covering the beings facial features. i began to scream but no noise came out, i tried to move my arms and body but i was paralyzed sitting up i felt one on the side of my bed but could not turn my head to see it so i focused my eyes on the being at the foot of my bed and tried to fight to move so i could run or scream but no luck . as fear overtook my senses the being at the foot of my bed became translucent and then disappeared. i gained control of my body as soon as the being disappeared the whole event lasted 2 to 3 minutes but i believe i was either being returned from an abduction or about to be abducted. i felt extreme fear, but also felt some what sedated, and exhausted. i was sharing the dorm room with my room mate and i woke him up and told him what i saw then asked if he would wave his hands around through the room to see if they were there but invisible so we did and found nothing. several months later my room mate saw a being around the same time at night in the same room. i was not there for his event. this all took place at a army base in san luis obisbo 400 feet from a helicopter landing pad . the army was completely not aware of the event on the base and i was to scared of repercussions if i reported it to anyone . not one airplane or helicopter in the sky. the beings gained access to the army base without any detection. before my experience i never believed in life outside of earth. i never saw a ufo that night i did look outside into the sky for evidence, but no ufo.
content.summary: Awoke by beings in my bedroom

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a buddy's apartment on cook street. as i was putting the key in the car door, i noticed 9 bright red-orange objects hovering in the sw sky. they were orbs in triangular formation about 500ft across. 6 orbs were stationary and 3 were twisting while ascending and descending.
content.summary: Orbs in triangular formation approx. 500ft across

content.detailedDescription: Driving truck local on i-24 in murfreesboro 9pm. i looked to the east and  saw what looked like an airplane flying west as it got closer i could see it was rectangular with two very big white lights about8ft. from each end of the craft the craft was about 15to20ft.Tall and 100to120ft. wide and what really got my attention was in front of the  craft was like a square flat piece 15ft.Tall 15ft. wide scanning back and forth from one light to the other it was a strange object to me it crossed over the road in front of me and i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Rectangular 20ft. tall 120wide

content.detailedDescription:
Bright light with bursts of light that pulsated coming off it in burst, star like pattern. it was too low to be a star, but higher than the airplane lights i observed. it has moved up and down in quick movements, but overall is slowly ascending.

we live on a hill and have a balcony in front of our house. i first noticed it form the couch, then went outside to see what the odd bright light was. i even got my husband who confirmed that it wasn't a star or airplane.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light with bursts of light that pulsated coming off it in burst, star like pattern. it was too low to be a star, but higher than the airplane lights i observed. it has moved up and down in quick movements, but overall is slowly ascending.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i got out of my car in a store parking lot. she said look at that thing in the sky.It was disc shaped with a bright orange light. for the life of me i couldn't think of what type of aircraft would have one large orange light on it. it was flying slowly but steadily and then the light went out, comepletely dark but we could still see the disc outline against the stars. there was no sound coming from the craft. the charleston intl. airport is about 3 miles from where we saw it but as far as we saw, there were no planes nearby or in persuit of the disc. we lost sight of the craft as it flew over a building and out of sight. i have to say that the thought of harm or abduction crossed both of our minds because there are so many stories of that type of thing. it scared and facinated us at the same time. i wonder if anyone else saw it because we were in a busy shopping area of north charleston on rivers avenue.We couldn't have been the only ones to see it. it was obviously not a plane or sattalite but we just kept saying, what was that thing?
content.summary: We watched it fly right over us. it made no sound, had an orange light on but then it went dark. we could still see the disc shaped outlline when it went dark. lost sight of it behind a building.

content.detailedDescription: Hello, my experience did not involve a ufo but still just as scary. when i was a little girl, i shared a room with my three sisters. i shared a bunkbed with my younger sister and my two older sisters shared the other bunkbed across the room, facing the opening of the bedroom door. my two brothers and oldest sister moved out so my older sister took the spare bedroom and i moved to the empty bed on the other side of the room. there were always paranormal events that took place but unfortunately for me, i was the only one seeing and hearing them. i was brutally punished for speaking about my experiences so from that point on, i had to deal with these scary events on my own. once i moved to the other side of the room, almost immediately i started to wake up in the middle of the night for absolutely no reason. when i would wake up, i always saw the same three beings standing in the doorway of my bedroom door. they were shaped like the all too familiar "little grey men". they had the large head, thin build with a little belly, long arms and short legs. one thing i couldn't help but notice is that i could see right thru them!! their bodies were visibly outlined but i could see thru them and they had these large bright blue almond shaped eyes. the three beings were different sizes. the smallest was directly in the front, the other was a little taller and the tallest of the three was almost as tall as the doorway opening. i was always questioning if i was actually seeing this, especially since it kept happening, night after night. i remember they would just stand in the doorway, looking around as if they were looking out to make sure no one was coming. they would sometimes, glance at me but continue to look around. again, i wasnt sure if my eyes were playing tricks on me because it was very dark, but they were also moving around so i just couldnt get my mind to comprehend what i was seeing. i also remember it was very silent. too silent, as if someone had eliminated the sound all together. i can recall on one occasion , rubbing my hands on the sheet under my pillow, trying to hear the sound it usually makes.....There was nothing.  absolutely no noise. i couldnt understand it. i dont remember being scared, just confused, intrigued, and vass amount of other emotions. this went on for sometime. i can not recall for how long nor can i recall how or when i went to sleep. i always woke up the next morning questioning my sanity. the very last encounter i remember is when, once again i was awakened and saw the same three beings in the doorway. this time was much different because this time for whatever reason, i decided to look in the direction of my feet. when i did that, i saw another being who looked exactly like the other three. it was on its knees, kneeling right next do me at my midsection.  i was laying on my back and as i made eye contact with it, it leaned in within inches of my face and then it put its hand on my chest. for whatever reason, i was not scared but i did experience a rush of many other emotions. i remember being curious more than anything. i wanted to know if i was really loosing my mind or is this thing really real. from under the cover, i began moving my hand toward the creatures hand with the thiught in mind that if i touch its hand and feel it under my hand, then i know it is real. so, i did just that. my hand stayed under the cover, but i still placed my hand on its hand and when i felt it, thats when i realized it was real. i still wasnt afraid for some strange reason but at the same time, i could not believe what i was feeling. the entire time this is happening, this thing is still in my face and we are looking eachother in the eyes. the last thing i remember is touching its hand and then waking up the next morning.  i sometimes wondered what happened in all thise encounters. what dont i remember.  but i know, i really dont want to know the answer to that question. i never mentioned this to anyone, especially my family because of the severe punishments i had received before when i attempted to explain the paranormal entities i had been seeing. it wasnt until twenty years later (3 yrs ago) i was having a conversation with my older sister. we were reminiscing about that house. at first i shared with her my experiences with the paranormal. she then shared with me a story that sent chills dwon my spine. she told me that the bunk bed she slept in ( the one i slept in when she changed rooms) was a scary sleeping place for her. she explained that she had seen, on several occasions,  a face leaning over from behind her, just staring at her. she said that because there was only about 3 inches if space from the wall to the bed, that no one would be able to fit in that space. she went on to tell me that this face was big, she could see right thru it, and it had large blue almond shaped eyes. it was then that i knew for a fact that i wasnt crazy. i had carried this with me for years and never told a soul because despite my experiences,  i was still unsure of what had taken place...Even though it happened often. i told my sister about my experiences and was so relieved that i wasnt alone. to this day, i wonder why? what did they want with us? what did they do? and what dont i remember.  i just pray they never come back. apart of me wonders if they did ever come back but i just dont remember any of it because they took those memories away from me. i have always had a problem with walking in my sleep. ive had this issue all my life. i still do it to this day, but when i wake up outside my front door, or on the grass, or when i wake up with bruises, i can only wonder if i was just sleep walking or was it something more. i would love to get answers. i would live to know if anyone else has had an experience similar to mine. thanks for reading my story.
content.summary: 3 to 4 beings that were see thru with blue almond shaped eyes

content.detailedDescription: Was dropping off a friend at about eight thirty pm. when i pulled out of the driveway and turned the car i noticed what looked like airplane lights (which i am very familiar with being an avid ufo researcher, and living close to an airport). i called the friend i had just dropped off to come out to see it, and when he did the light began to pulse on and off, and when the light completely dimmed you could not see much of a craft, there were no headlights on the craft, and there were several planes in the area at the time that had distinctly different lights, both brighter, and more of them. this was three lights that seemed to spin going from white to red, to white, and then repeat. i also noticed what looked like little bursts of light around the craft that appeared white, beige, and a deeper, darker red than what was on the craft.
content.summary: Disc shaped object that pulsed sequentially, and randomly

content.detailedDescription: I remember it be a clear and very few clouds, i was with my family visiting my wife's uncle with her dad. we were outside in the yard. i was talking and my oldest daughter ask me to write her name on a balloon and she wanted to let it go up into the sky. so i wrote her first name on it and my father in law was watching as well. well as the balloon started to climb really high into the sky i notice this patch of clouds and then the disc or saucer shape object with 2 cigar shape, all were metallic like, cause they turn white as the clouds was near and as they were further away they blended in with the blue sky, turning like invisible to the eye. when i first saw it i told my father-in-law, which now is decease, i told him look i see star treck until i realize it was 3 ufo's. the cigar shape was stationary underneath the saucer shape. i didn't have a camera at the time, it would have been. i did ask my daughter if she saw them and she said doesn't remember. i was never one to believe in such stuff, till that day. i know now we are not alone in this planet. i just wanted someone to know what i seen that day.
content.summary: One saucer shape and two cigar shape

content.detailedDescription: I was with my dad, he owned a mom and pop small trash company, it was between 1-4 in the morning. we heard a strange humming noise and then we saw the lights. the craft was very low to the ground, barely hovering over the truck. the craft hovering above us resembled what a vw bug may look like from the underside. therre was a strange humming noise, we both reached for our cell phones but the pictures and the entire phone got garbled. the radio in the truck went off air.It had seemed to come out of nowhere. it went over top of us very slowly and once it went over us it picked u extreme speed and then suddenly disappeared. all we could do was look at each other in disbelief. we mentioned it to a couple of people but we were just ridiculed. we know what we saw.
content.summary: Went over our vehicle

content.detailedDescription: There were no planes no helicopters in the sky during this event.. about maybe 10 mins later the sky lit up with planes an helicopters no sound, no clouds in sight very clear sky... the path these objects traveled was south going north east... i witnessed wat i thought was a formation some were side by side with a gap between the two then there were some that created a broken triangle.. the objects were all single objects not one object.. they glowed orangish... as they headed north east the objects accelerated an i noticed sum seemed to blink as they were in accelerating an got smaller an smaller then they were gone
content.summary: These objects did not wobble they did not blink or have any exterior lights these objects were a solid color i'm not sure of this but i think there was certain distance between them i'm not sure how much of a distance i took this as a formation

content.detailedDescription:
I  havent heard of another describtion of a ufo that moved like this.Me and my now x wife and my 2 daughter was living in the mountains.We was stayn with her dad.Me and him got into a fight so us four got into our blazer and left.We went a few miles down dirt road to a pull off.The kids fell asleep.I carried a 22 pistol the only bullets i had was birdshot.The x and i were standn outside the truck.I was on a.Taller mountain so we had a view of a.Valley of trees and mountains past it.We seen this bright light above the trees in the valley we was looking down on.We knew.There wasn't a.Light in that part of the woods.I knew where everone lived.For sure shouldn't a light there.So we got to really lookn
at and and we could clearly see the tree tops under the light.The only thing that made sense was that a oil rig was brought in it and the height of it was rite with rig but there was no way that we wouldn't have heard about it.Then the light got real bright almost seemed it was shining at us.That went one for a minute or 2.Then it started to move our way slowly and stopped then this thing started to swing like it was hangn from a string.Like a pendulum.And it did it over and over.Then stopped and started going straight across instead of half moon.It did.This over and over.We was staring at this thing with our mouth open.Then it slowly started towards us.This thing got close enough i could actually hit it with a rock.The light wasn't bright by now just a glow.Then all the sudden lights started flashn almost identical to a simon says game.Red blue and green yellow.It got so close that my x was freakn out screaming for me to shoot it.She kept screaming shoot it.I told her there ain't no way i am shootn that thing with birdshot.I am terrified by now it was.So close.I really believed it was going to suck us up and i was really worried about my 2 sleepn young girls.We was standn away from truck and it was rite in front of us.It was just flashn colors in a circle the same colors over and over.Seemed to last forever.I was so scared that it was going to take us two.Its hard to describe how it felt.But after what seemed like forever then it slowly left in oppiste direction it came.This happened like over ten years ago and i haven't told but a few ppl.Wish i could get hypnotize and go thru it.There isn't no way i am mistaken about this.Not when u could hit it with a rock...There is a rock with real strange stuff if u would like a picture.
content.summary: This thing was just rite on top of us.No mistaken it.

content.detailedDescription: White flash in opposite direction (north to south) of flight path from airport(south to north).  had no blinking lights commonly seen on the aircrafts passing over the park.  reminded me of space debris, meteor/meteorites, but the flash was different.  the park had about 50 persons present at the time.
content.summary: White flash bright then dimming

content.detailedDescription: Observed a object flashing red with a fire stream behind it heading north then stopped and fire behind stopped and changed direction to head south, also was being followed by another object flashing the same red color but with no fire behind.  first object also appeared to eject something. this was spotted by my wife first then me and also our two children.
content.summary: Two red glowing objects that canged direction

content.detailedDescription: Pulsating a riel lights. scorched impression in ground.
content.summary: I observed the pulsating lights briefly. two months later i observed a crop circle area in the field behind our home. now the vegetation is scorched where this crop circle appeared.
